casebody.data:
Burt LA FOUNTAIN, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 6548. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 15, 1932. Burt La Fountain, in pro. per. Clint W. Hager, U. S. Atty., and Hal Lindsay, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, SIBLEY, and WALK. ER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
